title: Riya and Her Smart Robot
story: Riya had a toy robot that could talk.
At first, the robot only knew how to say 'Hello.'
Riya taught it new words every day, like 'Good morning' and 'Thank you.'
One day, the robot surprised Riya by answering her question all by itself!
Her teacher smiled and said, 'This is called Artificial Intelligence. It means machines can learn just like us.'

quiz.question: Who taught the robot new words?
What do we call a machine that can learn?

lesson_takeaway: AI is when machines can learn from us and get smarter.
